docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Aug. 24 -- The Argentine Government, by decree, extended to Brazil today the same rights of non-belligerency that were granted to the United States immediately after Pearl Harbor, and communicated that measure to the...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Aug. 24 -- The Argentine Government, by decree, extended to Brazil today the same rights of non-belligerency that were granted to the United States immediately after Pearl Harbor, and communicated that measure to the Brazilian Ambassador in a cordial note in which the Argentine Government expressed its "fraternal solidarity."
docs.abstract: Argentina and other South Amer Nations express sympathy and backing

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Aug. 24 -- Confiscation measures against Axis assets in Brazil were enforced today as a reprisal for losses suffered through sinkings of Brazilian ships by Axis submarines.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Aug. 24 (U.P.) -- Uruguay's land, sea and air forces were on the alert today, following President Alfredo Baldomir's announcement of Uruguay's "complete" indentity of views with Brazil in her war against Germany and Italy.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Aug. 24 (U.P.) -- Uruguay's land, sea and air forces were on the alert today, following President Alfredo Baldomir's announcement of Uruguay's "complete" indentity of views with Brazil in her war against Germany and Italy.
docs.abstract: Capt Z Rodrigues announces River Plate and Atlantic zone patrol

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Aug. 25 -- Former Italian Foreign Minister Count Carlo Sforza will leave tomorrow by air for Washington to take up active direction of the Free Italy movement which was formally founded at the recent congress held in...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Aug. 25 -- Former Italian Foreign Minister Count Carlo Sforza will leave tomorrow by air for Washington to take up active direction of the Free Italy movement which was formally founded at the recent congress held in Montevideo, Uruguay, by representatives of all the anti-Fascist Italians on this continent.
docs.abstract: Sforza welcomes Ital Jews participation in legion

docs.snippet: From Royal Air Force headquarters in Britain last week came a grim estimate of the damage that had been inflicted on Germany since the beginning of the year. Five square miles spread about in nine of Germany's large cities, a total area about equal...
docs.lead_paragraph: From Royal Air Force headquarters in Britain last week came a grim estimate of the damage that had been inflicted on Germany since the beginning of the year. Five square miles spread about in nine of Germany's large cities, a total area about equal to Manhattan Island below Fourteenth Street, had been wiped out.

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Aug. 29 -- Brazil's one week in the war has materially changed the physical aspect of her large cities. Also, it has changed the life and outlook of the average citizen of this great country. The physical aspect of Rio de Janeiro is...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Aug. 29 -- Brazil's one week in the war has materially changed the physical aspect of her large cities. Also, it has changed the life and outlook of the average citizen of this great country. The physical aspect of Rio de Janeiro is different today from what it was a week ago.

headline.main: BRAZIL MUSTERING ALL HER FORCES; End of First Week at War Finds Her in Determined Mood
